lead_paragraph: With Plaxico Burress due in court next week, Giants Coach Tom Coughlin said that he did not know whether he would want Burress back if he is not sent to prison on a weapons charge.
snippet: With Plaxico Burress due in court next week, Giants Coach Tom Coughlin said that he did not know whether he would want Burress back if he is not sent to prison on a weapons charge.
